value:
$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|If everyone will allow me, I can
explain the situation more fully.$k$pEmbla's power, the ability to close
the world off into darkness, is the
polar opposite of Askr's power.$k$pAs Lord Askr's retainer, I have been
graced with the power to open the
world into light...$k$pO-of course, my own power is barely
a sliver compared to that at Lord
Askr's command, but even so...$k$pI want to use what power I do have,
and I believe I may be of some use.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|So, then...you can do something
about this darkness?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I believe so. If I reach the darkness,
my touch can cancel Embla's power
with Askr's, which will...umm...$k$pI suppose one might say that it will
obliterate the darkness. Something to
that effect, at least.$k$pThat said, I cannot guarantee results.
There is a considerable chance that
I'll have no impact, but we can try...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow, Ash!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|If your power works like you
describe, it will render Director
Letizia's attacks moot.$k$pThis is an incredible help, Ash.
We appreciate whatever you can do.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, you needn't spare it a second
thought. My duty is to assist you
in your efforts, after all...$k$p$EFace|If the darkness ever encroaches,
do not hesitate to call on me for aid.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Ash...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Lady Sharena? Is there
something you need?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|You're always so polite, but...
we're friends now! You could
relax a bit around us, you know?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|...Relax? How do you mean, Lady
Sharena? Am I using an inappropriate
tone with you? I mean no offense!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I only mean that...you don't need
to worry so much about what
you're saying!$k$pYou should feel like you can talk
to us like you'd talk to a member
of your family!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Hm. I see... I believe I understand.
I will consider how to speak to you
as mortals speak to their family.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ガルザス,ch07_18_Garzas_M_Normal,Face|Mareeta... You've grown up so strong,
so gentle.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|So, Letizia... Supposing the Askrans
take you at your word and do come
back...then what?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Then I'll kill them then and there.
What else?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|That is what I was I hoping to hear.
Kill Askr... That is Lady Embla's will.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|It seems to me you ought to be
more worried about the work
you've set yourself...$k$pHow many places have been
done now? Three? Four?$k$pAnd the forbidden tome? If we are
unable to perform the Rite of Closing,
it will have all been for nothing.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I know that! And I won't be ordered
around by some peevish mortal.$k$p$EFace|There is only one who can give
me orders...and that is the singular
Lady Embla.$k$p$Sbs150|
